about_the_game:
Apple Man is no ordinary fruit... Due to a mysterious force beyond anyone's comprehension, He has been blessed with two unbreakable legs, and a myriad of unbelievable special abilities. With his newfound power, he is absolutely determined to accomplish his lifelong dream of reaching the sky.

Apple Man is a 2D, physics-driven platformer featuring a uniquely challenging movement system where you dash through the air, and bounce yourself off of the environment to navigate various obstacles. With precise movement, you can dash through all the levels with ease. However, even the smallest of errors can compound into a catastrophic loss of control.

  • Conquer 10 unique and challenging levels.

  • No checkpoints.

  • Near infinite replayability.

  • Spend 1 hour trying to make 10 feet of progress.

  • Discover the hidden secrets of the world.

Epilepsy warning, Contains mild sexual content.
